briefdescription.para: Use this to update the target point.
Set/get the maximum force in Newtons.
The mouse joint does not support dumping.

detaileddescription.para: A mouse joint is used to make a point on a body track a specified world point. This a soft constraint with a maximum force. This allows the constraint to stretch and without applying huge forces. NOTE: this joint is not documented in the manual because it was developed to be used in the testbed. If you want to learn how to use the mouse joint, look at the testbed.
